title: Cumulative relative frequency of oak tree outlier

content.prompt: An outlier may be defined as a data point that is more than 1.5 times the interquartile range below the lower quartile or is more than 1.5 times the interquartile range above the upper quartile. According to this definition, what is the diameter, in inches, of the smallest tree that is an outlier?

topic.text: 1.7: Summary Statistics for a Quantitative Variable

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Calculate summary statistics, relative positions of points within a distribution, correlation, and predicted response.
